page.title: 19TRAFFIC AROUND BRIGHSTONE
page.content: When we looked at the Ordnance Survey map of our D_Block we noticed that there were three types of road in our area coloured red, brown and yellow. We did a traffic survey on June 20th from 3.30_3.40 pm. A group counted the traffic on the Military Road (red), in the village itself (brown) and on New Road (yellow) going either way. ______________________________________ VEHICLE RED BROWN YELLOW Car/small van 67 22 12 Lorry/large van 9 3 0 Bus 1 0 0 Coach 5 3 4 Motorbikes 3 1 0 Bicyles 0 4 1 Pedestrians 3 32 10 ______________________________________ The results show why the roads are classified on the map.
